item.title: What is Lost Tales of Periva?
item.description: Lost Tales of Periva (LToP) is a rules-light fantasy Role-Playing Game set in the World of Periva campaign setting. LToP is designed to be simple to learn without sacrificing depth of play. LToP can be played without miniatures, battle-mats or other expensive accessories. All you need is this book, a complete set of RPG dice, some pencils and paper, and some friends.

item.title: Terminology
item.description: This guide assumes that you already understand the basic concepts of Role-Playing Games. This section is designed to outline the basic terms you’ll need to know to play Lost Tales of Periva. Game Master The Game Master (GM) is a player designated as the referee of the game, enforcing the rules and making rulings on the various situations that the PCs encounter in their adventures. The GM also decides what happens in the fictional world of the game, acting out the parts of the various NPCs, creatures, and monsters.
